periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 3am, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 3am and 4am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Some of the storms could be severe. Mostly cloudy. Low around 68, with temperatures rising to around 70 overnight. South wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 7am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Some of the storms could be severe. Partly sunny. High near 84, with temperatures falling to around 81 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 9 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm. Some of the storms could be severe. Mostly clear. Low around 56, with temperatures rising to around 58 overnight. West wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 75. West wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West northwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Sunny
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 66. Northwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 48. Northwest wind 3 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 69. North northwest wind around 7 mph.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 7pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. East northeast wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 69. Southeast wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. East southeast wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 1pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 70. East southeast wind around 8 mph.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. Southeast wind around 7 mph.

periods.name: Memorial Day
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly sunny, with a high near 74. South southwest wind around 9 mph.
